National Committeeman | @SolomonYue

Mr. Solomon Yue, Jr., a legal immigrant born in Communist China, survived the Cultural Revolution and escaped tyranny by moving to America as a private international student, speaking only two English phrases: “Thank you” and “Coca Cola”. 寫報告阿:
英文方面恕我才疏學淺，還望拋磚引玉。

以下是仿照Global Magnitsky Human Rights and Accountability Act官方表格所製成的模板，每個制裁目標分別劃為個人資料、概述、個案和證據四部分，具體每個目標需要填甚麼，大家可以之後再分工和集思廣益。在此先想徵詢大家對範本有沒有特別提議，尤其是頂部那條大標題該怎麼寫。一旦定好的話，群策群力，好快就水到渠成。

林鄭都唔需要開獨立調查委員會了，因為民間的報告很快寫好，也比政府更有公信力。感謝手足一同努力，製成這個雛型。

現正需要徵召大量寫手，卻來了一大批想做校對的，無人寫卷又何來改卷呢？沒有人想寫報告釘死他們嗎？想成事的話就快快inbox我，可自行組成小隊分工找資料和撰寫。如果無人問津，那我只好擱置計劃。

Solomon Yue
National Committeeman | @SolomonYue

Mr. Solomon Yue, Jr., a legal immigrant born in Communist China, survived the Cultural Revolution and escaped tyranny by moving to America as a private international student, speaking only two English phrases: “Thank you” and “Coca Cola”. He worked two jobs to pay for his Management Sciences BA and International Trade MBA, and earned his U.S. citizenship under the Third Preference category for highly skilled professionals as an International Trade Economist. Mr. Yue then started a successful importing and wholesaling medical glove business. He has represented Oregon on the Republican National Committee since 2000. Mr. Yue has a seniority ranking of 14 among the 168 RNC members.

Solomon Yue
National Committeeman | @SolomonYue

Mr. Solomon Yue, Jr., a legal immigrant born in Communist China, survived the Cultural Revolution and escaped tyranny by moving to America as a private international student, speaking only two English phrases: “Thank you” and “Coca Cola”. He worked two jobs to pay for his Management Sciences BA and International Trade MBA, and earned his U.S. citizenship under the Third Preference category for highly skilled professionals as an International Trade Economist. Mr. Yue then started a successful importing and wholesaling medical glove business. He has represented Oregon on the Republican National Committee since 2000. Mr. Yue has a seniority ranking of 14 among the 168 RNC members.
